titleStmt.title: A brief instruction in the worship of God, and discipline of the churches of the New Testament, by way of question and answer with an explication and confirmation of those answers.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Owen. Cf. McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
